data.name: Sample-Tenable-Security-Center-1.0.0
data.description: Tenable Security Center provide actions like get all completed scans, scan specific assets and asset specific vulnerabilities

workflows.name: 1.1 List Completed Scan
workflows.description: Get all latest completed scans between specific time.

operations.title: List Completed Scans
operations.description: Provides all latest completed scans for given time duration

steps.name: Search scan records match on field name in CyOPs

step_variables._temp_update_scan_iri_name: {% for item in vars.result['hydra:member'] %} 	{{ vars.scan_name_iri.update({item['name']: '/api/3/' + vars.scan_table_name + '/' + item['uuid']}) }} {% endfor %}

steps.name: Mapping CyOPs fields with Security Center for record creation and updation

arguments._temp_create: {% for item in vars.create_list %} {{ vars.build_create.append({'name':item['name'], 'scanId': item['id'], 'duration': item['scanDuration'], 'state': item['status'], 'description': item['details'], 'launchDateTime': item['startTime'], 'createdTime': item['createdTime'], 'finishTime': item['finishTime'], 'totalIPs': item['totalIPs'], 'scannedIPs': item['scannedIPs'], 'owner': item['owner']['username'], 'repository': item['repository']['name'], 'repoDesc': item['repository']['description'], 'owners': vars.owners, "@type": vars.scan_module_type}) }} {% endfor %}
arguments.build_update: {{vars.update_list | json_query("[*].{name: name, scanId:id, duration:scanDuration, state:status, description: details, launchDateTime: startTime, createdTime: createdTime, finishTime:finishTime, completedIPs:completedIPs, totalIPs:totalIPs, scannedIPs:scannedIPs, owner:owner.username, repository:repository.name, repoDesc:repository.description}") }}

arguments._temp_scan_name_iri: {% if vars.result.persisted | length > 0 %}  {% for item in  vars.result.persisted %}   {{ vars.scan_name_iri.update({item['name']: item["@id"]}) }} {% endfor %}  {% else %} [] {% endif %}

steps.name: Categories update and create records of scans

arguments._temp_cate: {% for name, record in vars.scan_records.items() %}  	 	 {% if name in vars.exist_scan_name_list %} {{ vars.update_list.append(record) }}  	 {% else %} 		 {{ vars.create_list.append(record)}}  	 {% endif %}   {% endfor %}

routes.name: Alerts -> Configuration
Bulk Create Scans records -> Save Scan IRI
Search scan records match on field name in CyOPs -> Categories update and create records of scans
Categories update and create records -> Build records for create and update
Save Scan IRI -> Update Scan Records
Update Scan Records -> Call List Assets
Configuration -> List Scans
Mapping CyOPs fields with Security Center for record creation and updation -> Create Scans records
List Scans -> Search scan records match on field name in CyOPs

workflows.name: >> 1.3 Handle Assets in CyOPs
workflows.description: This playbook update and create the asset records in CyOPS  and build the relation between assets and scan modules.

arguments._temp_update: {% if vars.result.persisted | length > 0 %}  {% for item in vars.result.persisted %} {{ vars.asset_iri.update({item['ip']: item["@id"]}) }} {% endfor %}  {% endif %}

steps.name: Categories update and create records of Assets

arguments._temp_categries_asset_recors: {% for item in vars.assets %} {% if item['ip'] in vars.asset_iri.keys() | list %} {{ vars.update_asset.append(item) }} {% else %} {{ vars.create_asset.append(item)}} {% endif %} {% endfor %}

steps.name: Mapping CyOPs fields with Security Center for record creation and updation

arguments._temp_build_create: {% for item in vars.create_asset %} {{ vars.create_assets_records.append({'name':item['repository']['name'], 'hostname':item['dnsName'], 'macAddress': item['macAddress'], 'ip': item['ip'], 'description': item['repository']['description'], 'owners': vars.owners, "@type": vars.asset_module_type}) }} {% endfor %}
arguments.asset_update_record: {{vars.update_asset | json_query("[*].{name:repository.name, hostname:dnsName, macAddress:macAddress, ip:ip, description: repository.description}") }}

steps.name: Search asset records match on field IP in CyOPs

step_variables._temp_asset_iri: {% for item in vars.result['hydra:member'] %} 	{{ vars.asset_iri.update({item['ip']: '/api/3/' + vars.asset_table_name + '/' + item['uuid']}) }} {% endfor %}

routes.name: Save Asset IRI -> Update asset records
Build records for create and update -> Create Asset Records
Update asset records -> Build Relation
Start -> Configuration
Configuration -> Search Asset
Search Asset -> Categories update and create records of Assets
Create Asset Records -> Save Asset IRI
Categories update and create records of Assets -> Build records for create and update

workflows.name: 2.1 Update Incident > List Asset Vulnerabilities
workflows.description: Pull all vulnerabilities if one or more asset relates to an Incident.

step_variables._temp_update_asset_iri_dict: {% for item in vars.result %} {{ vars.asset_iri_dict.update({item['ip']: item["@id"]}) }} {% endfor %}

routes.name: Incident -> Save response
Get related records of asset -> List Asset Vulnerabilities
Get update payload -> Get all linked assets

Get all linked assets IRI -> Get related records of asset
Start -> List Assets123
List Assets123 -> Handle Assets in CyOPs

workflows.name: > 2.2 Handle vulnerabilities in CyOPs
workflows.description: Create and Delete vulnerabilities and build relation between asset and vulnerabilities

steps.name: Mapping CyOPs fields with Security Center fields for create record of vulnerabilities

arguments._create_temp: {% for item in vars.new_vulns_records %} {{ vars.vulns_create_records.append({'vulnerabilityId': item['pluginID'], 'name': item['pluginName'], 'port':item['port'], 'publishedDate':item['pluginPubDate'],'hostname':item['dnsName'], 'risk':item['riskFactor'], 'severity':item['severity']['name'], 'firstSeenDate':item['firstSeen'], "@type": vars.vuln_module_type, 'owners': vars.owners}) }} {% endfor %}
